data.name: Golfing In Aether Demo
data.detailed_description:
• Unique overall course layout for each session. Golfing In Aether accomplishes this through having each of the holes being its own independent floating island. The game will choose these at random from a pool at the start of a level and procedurally create the overall course layout.
  • Freedom to choose fixed playlists and the ability to practice holes individually.
  • Get-together with friends with support for up to 16 players online or 4 players locally with split screen play. You have the option of either taking it in turns via hotseat mode or by playing together in real time during either method of play.
  • Customize through a range of color-pickable designs for your golf ball. With various effects for its trail and hole effects for when achieving a hole in one.
  • Accessible with full gamepad support through the inclusion of an on-screen keyboard and ability to create local player profiles for saving any customizations, player names or gamepad settings.
data.about_the_game:
• Unique overall course layout for each session. Golfing In Aether accomplishes this through having each of the holes being its own independent floating island. The game will choose these at random from a pool at the start of a level and procedurally create the overall course layout.
  • Freedom to choose fixed playlists and the ability to practice holes individually.
  • Get-together with friends with support for up to 16 players online or 4 players locally with split screen play. You have the option of either taking it in turns via hotseat mode or by playing together in real time during either method of play.
  • Customize through a range of color-pickable designs for your golf ball. With various effects for its trail and hole effects for when achieving a hole in one.
  • Accessible with full gamepad support through the inclusion of an on-screen keyboard and ability to create local player profiles for saving any customizations, player names or gamepad settings.
data.short_description: Multiplayer minigolf designed around a procedural course layout allowing you to experience something different everytime you play. Support for both online play and four player split screen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® 700 Series (Maxwell) / AMD Radeon™ RX 400 Series / AMD Ryzen™ Processors with Radeon™ Vega Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Medium"
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Highest".
